Menace
When Bloodsoaked Berserker deals combat damage to a player, untap it and each other attacking creature. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
Bloodsoaked Berserker can't attack players it dealt combat damage to this turn.
[i]Skullkeeping[/i] – As long as you own four or more cards in exile with skull counter it, attacking creatures you control have lifelink.
